snippet: Having taken Novak Djokovic's No. 1 ranking and his Paris Masters title, Andy Murray will try to grab another of his friend and rival's crowns at the ATP finals....
lead_paragraph: Having taken Novak Djokovic's No. 1 ranking and his Paris Masters title, Andy Murray will try to grab another of his friend and rival's crowns at the ATP finals.

headline.print_headline: Now No. 1, Murray Goes to London Vying for Djokovic's Title
headline.main: Now No. 1, Murray Goes to London Vying for Djokovic's Title
